headline: Morgan Stanley Maintains its Citigroup Inc. (C) Buy Rating
summary: Citigroup Inc. (NYSE:C) is among the 11 Best Financial Services Stocks to Buy Right Now. Carlyle Group has collaborated with Citigroup Inc. (NYSE:C) to offer asset-backed lending to fintech lenders, the companies announced on June 12. Both companies are collaborating to share market knowledge and look into co-investment prospects in order to promote the expanding […]

headline: Citi cuts gold price target, forecasts silver gains: What to know
summary: Gold (GC=F) prices hover near $3,400 as investors weigh global uncertainty. Morning Brief host Brad Smith outlines Citi's (C) revised gold and silver (SI=F) forecasts, with gold targets cut and silver prices projected to rise. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Morning Brief here.
